divs: Sighting Detailswent out side to smoke a cig, around 9:20 p.m saw a very bright white light slowly moving overhead. heading west to east the front was very bright, underneith was very bright, and behind it was very bright, it looked like a star in the night sky but it was like maybe a 1000 feet above me . no sound, very cool whatever it was? from beginning of my sighting to end was maybe 3 minutes, i'm listening to the scanner now airport and police havent heard anything. whatever it was and how low it was i was expecting to see some kinda flashing lights like a aircraft has. the whole thing was bright white. ??????
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Benton City
There were no other sightings in Benton City on or around May 23rd 2009
Summary: Very bright light came over the house, never seen a light like it very bright and quiet
